hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Qatada bin Rabi Al-Ansari;:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "If anyone of you enters a Mosque, he should not sit until he has offered a tworak` at prayer

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ مَا جَاءَ فِي التَّطَوُّعِ مَثْنَى مَثْنَى
chapter.eng-name: What is recited in the two Rak'a (Sunna) of the Fajr
